content.rendered:
Welcome to Mannheimer Swartling’s press room. Here you will find news, reports, contact information and press photos. If you would like further information, please feel free to contact Helena Carlquist, Chief Marketing and Communications Officer.

Mannheimer Swartling offers full-service counsel in virtually all areas of business law. The firm’s clients include Swedish and international enterprises and organisations. Sustainability, along with the firm’s fundamental values – business focus, quality and team spirit – forms an integral part of our practice. Mannheimer Swartling employs 650 people, including 480 lawyers, at offices in Stockholm, Gothenburg, Malmö, Brussels, New York and Singapore.
